title: Taught course: "An introduction to Frontend"
description:
<https://github.com/marcomontalbano/an-introduction-to-frontend>\
In 2017 I devised and taught this course, meant to be an introduction to frontend for backend developers and interns in Sopra Steria.\
Technologies always improve and I adapt my course accordingly. This course now covers HTML, CSS, SCSS, and Javascript (ES6) basics, DOM manipulation with Vanilla JS, dependency management with NPM, and bundling with Parcel.
